Service Details: - Provides free primary medical care and community support to the world’s most impoverished, transforming lives one at a time by mobilizing our hospital ships and network of dedicated volunteers to reach communities in need- Works with host nations to help fill the voids in local health care systems, while serving the immediate needs of their population- Crewed by 450 volunteers from around the world, delivers medical excellence and developmental programs with integrity and compassion- Provides a variety of curative surgical interventions, along with training opportunities for local medical professionals- Collaborates with qualified local and international partners to offer holistic support to developing nations striving to make healthcare accessible for all- Volunteer opportunities available
